timeline.message:
[dart] Configure and use import mapping

This prevents models from being generated which would clash with exisiting dart types, e.g. List.

[dart-dio] Remove redundant modelToIgnore & ignore dart:core import

* modelToIgnore is now handled via importMappings the same way other generators do this
* choose not to import dart:core as this is available by default
[dart-dio] EnumClass is a reserved word in built_value

timeline.bodyText: I think this needs to be noted as a breaking change
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: This is only happening in dart-dio and anything with that name would not have compiled up until now. Since EnumClass is a name coming from the spec.
replies.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.bodyText: for simplicity Objects.equals() which gives you null-safety and fewer keystrokes
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: Writing more Dart and Kotlin than Java lately, thanks!
replies.author: kuhnroyal
